segments.text: I'm looking at two children engaging in some quiet mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet for a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is clearly labeled 'COOKIE JAR' and it's full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little hand is already inside, grabbing the treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands beside him, looking up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, as if waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite clever how they're working together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't tip over with all those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They really seem to be enjoying their clandestine operation.
segments.speaker: PAR
